short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your productivity and dial hands-free in Salesloft and Outreach.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CallCloud is the #1 power dialer / auto dialer for Salesloft, Outreach, and Hubspot. 

✅ One Click Free Integration
To get started just add CallCloud to Chrome and open your cadence/sequence in Salesloft, Outreach, or Hubspot.

📈2x Your Dials
CallCloud auto dials in Salesloft, Outreach, and Hubspot, filters out bad numbers, skips voicemails, logs calls, and moves between prospects at lightning speed to make more dials, faster.

📉Decrease Dial Burnout
Power dial directly in Salesloft, Outreach, and Hubspot and save yourself the manual hassle. 

🎵Listen to Music While you Dial
Open up your favorite playlist and skip the ringtone. 

📍Need support? Just email us at support@callcloud.app
